vignette.name: Encapsulating and Reusing Your Work
vignette.bodytext: No matter how easy we make it to use Max, making patches takes time. You'll be happier if you can reuse some the of work you've done already, and Max has a number of ways to let you do this.

ul.li: Creating abstractions from patchers is the most basic way to reuse your work.
Clippings are small pieces of patches you can save and re-use.
Templates are starting points for new patches.
You can create reusable object prototypes as variations on the default appearance and behavior of user interface objects.
